title.span: Getting Started with Altair Object Store

prodinfo.prodname: Getting Started with Altair Object Store

shortdesc.p: Object Store is an enhanced next-generation platform core that has combined capabilities of numerous services.

topicmeta.shortdesc: Object Store is an enhanced next-generation platform core that has combined capabilities of numerous services.

prodinfo.prodname: Getting Started with Altair Object Store

shortdesc.p: Altair Object Store is an advanced content management system that combines the capabilities of numerous services and an action execution engine that applies Access Control List (ACL) and other authorization policies for enhanced security.

topicmeta.shortdesc: Altair Object Store is an advanced content management system that combines the capabilities of numerous services and an action execution engine that applies Access Control List (ACL) and other authorization policies for enhanced security.

prodinfo.prodname: Getting Started with Altair Object Store

shortdesc.p: The Altair Object Store allows you to model engineering objects that are independent of the user interface and can be consumed in a variety of applications via APIs.

topicmeta.shortdesc: The Altair Object Store allows you to model engineering objects that are independent of the user interface and can be consumed in a variety of applications via APIs.

prodinfo.prodname: Getting Started with Altair Object Store

shortdesc.p: The Object Store architecture includes, in addition to the central Object Store engine that manages configuration and execution, an environment manager, a multi-model database, an event bus, and gateways. Investigate the many different parts that make up the Object Store architecture.

topicmeta.shortdesc: The Object Store architecture includes, in addition to the central Object Store engine that manages configuration and execution, an environment manager, a multi-model database, an event bus, and gateways. Investigate the many different parts that make up the Object Store architecture.

prodinfo.prodname: Getting Started with Altair Object Store

shortdesc.p: This section provides the prerequisites, instructions to install Object Store, verification of Object Store installation, and Object Store service commands.

topicmeta.shortdesc: This section provides the prerequisites, instructions to install Object Store, verification of Object Store installation, and Object Store service commands.

prodinfo.prodname: Getting Started with Altair Object Store

shortdesc.p: The Object Store plugin for Visual Studio Code (VSCode) provides an efficient coding environment for authoring and onboarding content packs.

topicmeta.shortdesc: The Object Store plugin for Visual Studio Code (VSCode) provides an efficient coding environment for authoring and onboarding content packs.

prodinfo.prodname: Getting Started with Altair Object Store

topic.title: Register the Content Pack with VS Code

shortdesc.p: You can register the content pack with VS Code to use the objects.

topicmeta.linktext: Register the Content Pack with VS Code
topicmeta.shortdesc: You can register the content pack with VS Code to use the objects.

prodinfo.prodname: Getting Started with Altair Object Store

shortdesc.p: Altair Object Store provides the building blocks required to create and deploy applications.

topicmeta.shortdesc: Altair Object Store provides the building blocks required to create and deploy applications.

shortdesc.p: Create the objects in Object Store to generate the APIs for the ToDo application.

prodinfo.prodname: Getting Started with Altair Object Store

topic.title: Connect to a Server and Create a Profile

shortdesc.p: Before we begin, we need to connect to the Object Store server, create a profile and fetch the essential remote content packs.

topicmeta.linktext: Connect to a Server and Create a Profile
topicmeta.shortdesc: Before we begin, we need to connect to the Object Store server, create a profile and fetch the essential remote content packs.

prodinfo.prodname: Getting Started with Altair Object Store

shortdesc.p: Now that we have connected to the server, created a profile and downloaded the essential remote content packs, we can begin creating our local content pack.

topicmeta.shortdesc: Now that we have connected to the server, created a profile and downloaded the essential remote content packs, we can begin creating our local content pack.

topic.title: Create an Advanced Application using Object Store

shortdesc.p: Creating an advanced (Digital Twin) application to design, build, test, optimize, evaluate the what-if scenarios, perform predictive maintenance, and extend the remaining useful life (RUL) of their products without the need for physical prototypes.
